entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning near noon then changing to rain late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
